translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the dependent origination, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.24. Vitakkattika, Kusalattika🔽Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.🔽Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  vitakkattika kusalattika  na sa vitakka sa vicāram na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pannarasa pe avigate pannarasa  na sa vitakka sa vicāram na akusalam dhammam paccayā sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: The section on thought, The section on the wholesome

original: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate satta.
analyzed: na sa vitakka sa vicāram na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca avitakka avicāraḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā satta adhipatiyā satta pe avigate satta
